I had to chuckle because I was in Chicago just two weeks ago and the schools closed after a blizzard. My family lived in Syracuse, one of the capitals of massive lake effect snows, for a few years, and even we got snow days once in a blue moon.
I wouldn't even leave my kids in the car at the gas station if I have to go inside to pay! It's a hassle but I would never leave them alone where something bad could happen.

When old pipelines break because they needed to be replaced. These people are putting themselves in harms way because they choose to. when you can come up with a better plan that benefits all people then your comment will be deemed valid. Until then please educate yourself.
